page.title: 17Arable
page.content: {Arable}is a farm which just grows crops and has grassland. We went to{ {Westleigh Farm}where they grow all sorts of flowers. They also grow Strawberry plants etc. They sell them to people across the road, that is a Garden Centre. In our area there are a lot of grassland farms. You can get all sorts of grassland. For instance there is{Rough Grazing}land. It also means crops. There are many different sorts. There are{Barley meal, Barley, {Mixed poultry corn and Cut maize}and many other sorts. Barley wheat is the most important and grown cereal. The husks are used for making nylon and antiseptics. Rye and straw are good for thatching roofs and paper making. Maize is grown for{silage}and as{ {vegetable.}
